item.title: [Python] Environment construction of auto-sklearn that semi-automates machine learning (Mac&Docker)
item.description: What is # auto-sklearn A library that can semi-automatically perform preprocessing of machine learning, algorithm selection, and hyperparameter search. See below for detailed explanation. What is auto-sklearn? Automatic machine learning with WPython auto sklearn Data analysis with Python: Automation of machine learning Build an environment for auto-sklearn on mac As a premise, auto-sklearn is developed on Ubuntu, and it works on Linux but may not work on Mac or Window.
